rows.label: bf11680100_0010
rows.name: Metsu's target is the Iiran Core.

rows.label: bf11680100_0020
rows.name:
It is said to be in the chest area
when it takes its true form.

rows.label: bf11680100_0030
rows.name: But the Iiran Divine Beast hasn't transformed yet.

rows.label: bf11680100_0040
rows.name:
You think the Heaven's Holy Grail
is taking a nap or something?

rows.label: bf11680100_0050
rows.name: That would actually work out better for us.

rows.label: bf11680100_0060
rows.name:
That ridge will form the upper body,
and the Core should appear there.

rows.label: bf11680100_0070
rows.name:
It'll take a while for the army
to organize an assault team.

rows.label: bf11680100_0075
rows.name: We'll go on ahead. We leave tomorrow morning.
